ImpactRiskOpportunity.name: ImpactRiskOpportunity
ImpactRiskOpportunity.description: Represents an impact, risk, or opportunity that can be evaluated and scored as a part of an organization's double-materiality assessment. Also known as an IRO.

BusinessUnit.description: The business unit of the impact, risk, or opportunity.

Country.description: Specifies the country of the impact, risk, or opportunity.

Description.description: The description of the impact, risk, or opportunity.

Effect.description: Specifies the effect of the impact, risk, or opportunity, such as positive or negative.

HasHumanRightsImpact.description: Indicates whether the impact, risk, or opportunity has a human rights impact (true) or not (false).

ImpactType.description: Specifies the impact type of the impact, risk, or opportunity, such as actual or potential.

IsMaterial.description: Indicates whether the impact, risk, or opportunity warrants a report (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the impact, risk, or opportunity.

Organization.description: The organization associated with the impact, risk, or opportunity.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Timescale.description: Specifies the timescale of the impact, risk, or opportunity.

Type.description: Specifies the type of record, such as impact, risk, or opportunity.

ValueChainSegment.description: Specifies the segment of the value chain for the impact, risk, or opportunity.
